answers.author: Alex Rivera
answers.text:
Hi Jared,
I found a few sample ordinances for you, as well as three actual ordinances. All are from municipalities in Kansas, and the samples are from the Kansas League of Municipalities. Here are the links, and one attached document.
http://www.wathenakansas.com/Ordinance%20605.pdf
http://www.stfranciskansas.com/pdf/O_560.pdf
http://www.lkm.org/resources/ordinances/samples/spvehicles.php
I hope this helps. If you have any further questions, I can be reached at arivera@transformgov.org
Alex Rivera - Alliance for Innovation Intern

author: Jared Cobb
text: We're considering an ordinace to permit the use of special purpose vehicles (work-site vehicles, golf carts, etc.) on city streets. Does anyone have a model ordinance or experience they could share? Thanks for your help!
title: Special Purpose Vehicles
